sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Violence Prevention Task Force Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Violence Prevention Task Force Act.

sections.heading: Violence Prevention Task Force; duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:
sections.text: Violence Prevention Task Force; duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:

sections.heading: Report to the Governor and General Assembly
sections.text: The Task Force shall report to the Governor and the General Assembly, by December 1 of each year, its activities for the previous year.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
